name: MIRAX Virtual Slide File
summary: Learn about .MRXS files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: MIRAX slides can be analyzed under multiple viewing conditions. For example, the slides can be magnified, and the color, brightness, and contrast can be adjusted. Additionally, MIRAX files support fluorescent slide handling.
NOTE: The Pannoramic Viewer application is the same program as the MIRAX Viewer program. It was developed by 3DHISTECH.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
